welcomePageMessage: Create new lessons and tests. To upload already existing content(SCORM, PDF etc) click on `Upload external resource`
contact_us: In case of any problems, plese contact us at:
wish: We wish you a smooth learning :)
COOKIES_TEXT: This service uses functional cookies systematically to ensure BrainCore Solutions can provide you with a secure use of this website. Cookies are small files or pieces of text that are downloaded to your browser when a visitor accesses a website or application.

EDU_Are you sure you want to discard Cre: Are you sure you want to discard creating class
EDU_Are you sure you want to remove Team: Are you sure you want to remove the class? The action is not reversible!
